thread.title: Caroline
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Caroline

author: Caroline
title: Caroline
text: I was very excited to place an order through American Frame, the website is very interactive, you can upload a sample image to see what the finished product will look like. Unfortunately, I did not go through with the order as the cost to ship overseas was more expensive than the order total. I wish you had more shipping options available instead of just UPS worldwide expedited. Im in no rush for the order but the shipping on two frames was $250, considerably more than the order total. I was very disappointed. Would love a no frills shipping option.
